name: SPEAKER, The
text:
—I inform the House of the death on Tuesday, 14 May 2002 of Colin Lawrence Carige, a member of this House for the Division of Capricornia from 1975 to 1977. As a mark of respect to the memory of Colin Carige, I invite honourable members to rise in their places.
Honourable members having stood in their places—
—I thank the House.
